import axios from"../axios";// gett all cart by id user
var getAllCartsByIdUser=function getAllCartsByIdUser(idUser){return axios.get("/api/getAllCartsByIdUser?id_user=".concat(idUser));};// id_user || id_product || quantity
var addCart=function addCart(id_user,id_product,quantity){return axios.post("/api/createCart",{id_user:id_user,id_product:id_product,quantity:quantity});};// /api/deleteCart
var deleteCart=function deleteCart(id){return axios.post("/api/deleteCart",{id:id});};// /api/updateCart
var updateCart=function updateCart(id,quantity){return axios.post("/api/updateCart",{id:id,quantity:quantity});};// /api/updateStatusCart
var updateStatusCart=function updateStatusCart(id,status){return axios.post("/api/updateStatusCart",{id:id,status:status});};export{getAllCartsByIdUser,addCart,deleteCart,updateCart,updateStatusCart};
